Description:
You are a strategic thinker passionate about driving solutions. You have found the right team.As the Scrum professional, you will spend each day defining, refining and delivering set goals for our firmAs a Scrum Master, you will act as a leader for your team(s) by facilitating clear communication to management and to the team. As the Scrum professional for Firmwide Management Information Systems, you’ll collaborate with dedicated product owners and feature teams to drive the planning and execution of key business initiatives. The Firmwide Management Information Systems (MIS) in Financial Analysis (FA) is responsible for the accuracy, integrity and timeliness of the Line of Business segment results for actuals, while providing reporting to both internal and external clients.Job Responsibilities:Work with the Product owner to align teams with the product vision, initiatives, and OKRs
Owns Sprint planning, grooming sessions, and retrospectives
Create an environment of collaboration within the teams that allows for open dialogue and productive solutions for resolving conflicts
Champion continuous improvement activities to reduce waste and increase productivity; coach organization to conduct continuous improvement events
Communicate organizational impediments to leadership; clear impediments for the team
Embrace the concept of continuous learning in your own journey and instill the same in the team(s) you coach
Coach product owners in creation and maintenance of the product backlog, including story writing and estimationQualifications:BS/BA degree or equivalent experience
Familiarity and adherence to core Agile values and principles
Experience as a practicing Scrum Master on a team
Experience with JIRA, Familiarity with Continuous Delivery
Understanding of Agile and Scrum framework and its application in Product Development and delivery organization
Leverage skills from coaching, facilitation, conflict resolution, and more to serve the team(s)
Ability to collaborate with and influence people at various levelsJPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the oldest financial institutions, offers innovative financial solutions to millions of consumers, small businesses and many of the world’s most prominent corporate, institutional and government clients under the J.P. Morgan and Chase brands. Our history spans over 200 years and today we are a leader in investment banking, consumer and small business banking, commercial banking, financial transaction processing and asset management.
